name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
descr: 关于此游戏You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife, Sei.  There's a problem though.  Sei needs memory components, but of course, getting the money for that is easier said then done, so expect to encounter some shady and unsavory individuals on your way...Relaxing, Immersive OST!Gorgeous, animated backgrounds and sprites!Gripping, dark narrative!Colorful and well written characters!
detail:
名称: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
类型: 休闲
开发者: Sigyaad Team
发行商: Sigyaad Team
发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 24 日
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统: 7/8/10
处理器: Dual Core CPU
内存: 500 MB RAM
显卡: Integrated Graphics Card
存储空间: 需要 400 MB 可用空间
